name: Stamp and Coin Stores: Philatelic and Numismatic Supplies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Retailers that sell postage stamps, coins, and related accessories for
the purpose of stamp collecting, coin collecting, or investment.
For the sale of postage stamps through government operated postal
services, use MCC 9402.
For mail and packaging services that also sell stamps, use MCC
7399.
